content: the measurements of the dog chest approx 28/32 40/44 48/52 cm / 11/12½ 15/17 19/20½ back length approx 24 32 - 40 cm / 9½ 12½ 15 3/4 examples of sizes of dogs xs = chihuahau s = bichon frise m = cocker spaniel materials drops karisma from garnstudio 50-100-150 g color no 18 red 50-50-100 g color no 01 off white drops small circular needle size 3 5 mm / us 4 or the size needed to obtain the correct knitting gauge drops double pointed needle and small circular needle size 3mm / us 2 or 3
